title: By the King, a proclamation whereas we have received certain information, that James Duke of Monmouth, Ford Late Lord Gray, outlawed for high treason, with divers other traytors and outlaws, are lately landed in an hostile manner at Lyme ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by the assigns of John Bill, deceas'd, and by Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
